00033 #ifndef DATASOURCE_HPP_
00034 #define DATASOURCE_HPP_

00036 #include "libidx.h"

00038 namespace ebl {

00040   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00041   LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::LabeledDataSource()
00042     : data(1), labels(1), dataIter(data, 0), labelsIter(labels, 0) {
00043   }
00044 
00045   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00046   LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::LabeledDataSource(Idx<Tdata> &data_, 
00047                                                      Idx<Tlabel> &labels_)
00048     : data(data_), labels(labels_), dataIter(data, 0), labelsIter(labels, 0) {
00049   }
00050 
00051   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00052   int LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::size() {
00053     return data.dim(0);
00054   }
00055 
00056   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00057   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::fprop(state_idx &state, 
00058                                               Idx<Tlabel> &label) {
00059     //state.setndim(data.order()-1)
00060     //state.resize(data.dims()+1, data.dims()+data.order());
00061     state.resize(1, data.dim(1), data.dim(2)); // TODO: make this generic
00062     //label.resize();
00063     idx_copy(*dataIter, state.x);
00064     idx_copy(*labelsIter, label);
00065   }
00066 
00067   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00068   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::next() {
00069     ++dataIter;
00070     ++labelsIter;
00071 
00072     if(!dataIter.notdone()) {
00073       dataIter = data.dim_begin(0);
00074       labelsIter = labels.dim_begin(0);
00075     }
00076   }
00077 
00078   template<typename Tdata, typename Tlabel>
00079   void LabeledDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel>::seek_begin() {
00080     dataIter = data.dim_begin(0);
00081     labelsIter = labels.dim_begin(0);
00082   }

00086   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00087   MnistDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::MnistDataSource(Idx<Tdata> &inp, 
00088                                                   Idx<Tlabel> &lbl,
00089                                                   intg w, intg h, 
00090                                                   double b, double c)
00091     : LabeledDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>(inp, lbl) {
00092     bias = b;
00093     coeff = c;
00094     width = w;
00095     height = h;
00096   }
00097 
00098   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00099   void MnistDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::init(Idx<Tdata> &inp, Idx<Tlabel> &lbl, 
00100                                             intg w, intg h, double b, double c){
00101     this->data = inp;
00102     this->labels = lbl;
00103     typename Idx<Tdata>::dimension_iterator      dIter(inp, 0);
00104     typename Idx<Tlabel>::dimension_iterator     lIter(lbl, 0);
00105     this->dataIter = dIter;
00106     this->labelsIter = lIter;
00107     bias = b;
00108     coeff = c;
00109     width = w;
00110     height = h;
00111 
00112   }
00113 
00114   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00115   void MnistDataSource<Tdata, Tlabel>::fprop(state_idx &out, 
00116                                              Idx<Tlabel> &label) {
00117     out.resize(1, height, width);
00118     intg ni = this->data.dim(1);
00119     intg nj = this->data.dim(2);
00120     intg di = 0.5 * (height - ni);
00121     intg dj = 0.5 * (width - nj);
00122     idx_fill(out.x, bias * coeff);
00123     Idx<double> tgt = out.x.select(0, 0);
00124     tgt = tgt.narrow(0, ni, di);
00125     tgt = tgt.narrow(1, nj, dj);
00126     idx_copy(*(this->dataIter), tgt);
00127     idx_addc(out.x, bias, out.x);
00128     idx_dotc(out.x, coeff, out.x);
00129     label.set((this->labelsIter).get());
00130   }
00131 
00132   template<class Tdata, class Tlabel>
00133   bool load_mnist_dataset(const char *dir, 
00134                           MnistDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel> &train_ds, 
00135                           MnistDataSource<Tdata,Tlabel> &test_ds,
00136                           int train_size, int test_size) {
00137     // loading train and test datasets
00138     string train_datafile = dir;
00139     string train_labelfile = dir;
00140     string test_datafile = dir;
00141     string test_labelfile = dir;
00142     train_datafile += "/train-images-idx3-ubyte";
00143     train_labelfile += "/train-labels-idx1-ubyte";
00144     test_datafile += "/t10k-images-idx3-ubyte";
00145     test_labelfile += "/t10k-labels-idx1-ubyte";
00146     Idx<Tdata> train_data(1, 1, 1), test_data(1, 1, 1);
00147     Idx<Tlabel> train_labels(1), test_labels(1);
00148     if (!load_matrix<Tdata>(train_data, train_datafile.c_str())) {
00149       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << train_datafile << endl;
00150       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00151     }
00152     if (!load_matrix<Tlabel>(train_labels, train_labelfile.c_str())) {
00153       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << train_labelfile << endl;
00154       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00155     }
00156     if (!load_matrix<Tdata>(test_data, test_datafile.c_str())) {
00157       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << test_datafile << endl;
00158       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00159     }
00160     if (!load_matrix<Tlabel>(test_labels, test_labelfile.c_str())) {
00161       std::cerr << "Mnist dataset, failed to load " << test_labelfile << endl;
00162       ylerror("Failed to load dataset file");
00163     }
00164     
00165     // TODO: implement DataSourceNarrow instead of manually narrowing here.
00166     train_data = train_data.narrow(0, train_size, 0); 
00167     train_labels = train_labels.narrow(0, train_size, 0);
00168     test_data = test_data.narrow(0, test_size, 5000 - (0.5 * test_size)); 
00169     test_labels = test_labels.narrow(0, test_size, 5000 - (0.5 * test_size));
00170 
00171     test_ds.init(test_data, test_labels, 32, 32, 0.0, 0.01);
00172     train_ds.init(train_data, train_labels, 32, 32, 0.0, 0.01);
00173     return true;
00174   }

00193   return size;
00194   }
